name: Sea of Debris
description:
You are a sailor, in the middle of the ocean. Would you lost control to the currents or fight them until your last breath?

Sail around the sea and avoid all the debris floating towards you, navigate through the currents, and keep your ship alive.

Fun Fact: The only objects using actual sprites are the ship, gui and debris. Everything else is fully generated using shaders and noise textures(which in turns gets generated by code as well, so no texturing there).
* The assets are from the free Kenney Assets collections.

CONTROLS:
W / Up arrow - Accelerate
S / Down arrow - Decelerate
A / Left arrow - Turn Left
D / Right arrow - Turn Right
